name: Circle Hitter
description:
Warning

  • This game may be more difficult than it looks, so please use caution before playing for your mental health.

Main gameplay

  • Dodge: Slide the mouse to control the protagonist’s movement and dodge increasingly dense barrages.
  • Counterattack: Click the mouse at the right moment to bounce back the enemy’s bullets, and use the rebounded bullets to eliminate the enemy.
  • Stamina: Attacks consume stamina, which is restored when enemies are eliminated. Stamina also slowly recovers on its own.

Pick power-ups

Staying within the power-ups range can trigger powerful effects.

Global leaderboard

Survive and get amazing scores, occupy a place on the global leaderboard, and show off to your friends!

Many characters

By the way, remember to pick up the dropped coins and use them to unlock more unique characters.

Trial mode

Are you strong enough? Through trials, characters can gain stronger abilities!

More feature introductions

  • Easy to get started, just slide the mouse and click the left mouse button to enjoy the game.
  • Difficult to master, hone your mouse skills and become a master of mouse control!
  • Minimalistic graphics, interesting circular interface design.
  • Supports multiple languages (other than Chinese/English, other languages are machine-translated).
  • Steam achievements.
  • Steam cloud.
